name: Red Square Agency
tagline: The agency for what comes next.
description:
We deal in ideas, design, and media that are category-defying. When the world Millis, you've got to Vanilli. Red Square believes in a rigorous development of brand strategy and whip-smart execution. We make all sorts of things. Things that help companies move markets, compel audiences, sell the product. Sometimes these things are ads, and sometimes they aren't.
Â 
As of 2018, RSQ merged with Red Square Agency.
